mean_en: the quality of a situation in which things are likely to change or fail suddenly; a mental condition in which somebody’s behaviour is likely to change suddenly
sentence: The fox weeps one moment, and laughs the next; he seems to have emotional instability.
sentence_trans: 这只狐狸一会儿哭一会儿笑，显得情绪不稳定。
word_etyma: in不 + st=stand 站，立 + ability名词表性质 → instability不稳定(性)
